      Methods in SpaceSmasher that return Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Block BlockSet.getBlockAt(int row, int column)
      Returns a block at a row and column, Returns Null if outside of grid.
      Block BlockSet.getCollidedBlock(Ball ball)
      Check for an return the block the given ball is colliding with, if any.
      Block BlockSet.getFirstCageBlock()
      Get the first cage block found.
      Block BlockSet.getLastCageBlock() 
      Block BlockSet.getLowestVisibleBlock()
      Get the lowest block that is currently visible in the set.
      Block BlockSet.setBlockAt(int row, int column, Block.BlockType type)
      Sets a block at position, [row][column] to type Returns a reference to created Block.
      Methods in SpaceSmasher with parameters of type Block 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Breaks the given block in the set.
